title: SRU beta comes to a close

replies.body: yay, first!
urf is coming back in April i believe
Makes sense now, Urf the Nami-Tee is coming out (NEW SKIN)
Pls no urf i beg dgaf about ur comments i dont like urf
Vote up if you noticed the Easter egg
does turning off sound on LOL improves fps? i feel guilty to the DJ sona supporting me :/
Mainly if you use motherboard sound; if you have a seperate sound card then no not really.

It can. If your computer isn't processing the audio for LoL then that's a chunk of performance it can put towards other things.

I've ran it muted for a while now. You lose some sense of surroundings when you can't hear people sneaking through your jungle, but it's calmer and you get used to it.
I like turtles {{champion:72}}
Where is our SR Beta Summoner Icon!!!
Is MOAR a hint to a new game type like URF?
urf is almost here again, around 18 more days
Urf + that new kassadin ult... im going to be having so much fun :3
you still need to have the mana required to cast at max stats though.
there is no mana in urf
sorry dude kass is a perma ban in urf

Azir will also probably be a perma ban, cause of his passive...OP "Azir gains 1.25% bonus attack speed for every 1% of his cooldown reduction.", and the buff of awesomely buffing also doubled ranged heroes attack speed.
wait, does this mean new sr is gonna be removed?

no man 
it means they are removing the beta TAG as in its not beta its full and finished

No.

It will go back to its beta release textures.

11th comment
I think that a new SR icon given out to everyone would be great

sharper edges on textures is helping a lot, soft is alright but it's important to keep your edges and values distinct
whoever gave you feedback helped you guys improve it a tonne - i still think the perspective looks a little strange on the stump area but it looks much better, dark and richer in colour. 

i PERSONALLY wouldn't mind a little more clutter in the jungle but i understand it could affect performance/be distracting

are you planning on doing any seasonal maps? 


anyways, love it!! cheers {{item:3174}}
